CHAT.comment: BOB RILEY, GOVERNOR OF ALABAMA, Appellant v. YVONNE KENNEDY, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 1:00 p.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF KEVIN C. NEWSOM ON BEHALF OF THE APPELLANT
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PAMELA S. KARLAN ON BEHALF OF THE APPELLEES
ORAL ARGUMENT OF KANNON K. SHANMUGAM, ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE APPELLEES
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF KEVIN C. NEWSOM ON BEHALF OF THE APPELLANT
(Whereupon, at 2:02 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
